# Bi-Polar Suspension to 2012 when ﬁnal time line separation of Meajhe Zone /Bridge Zone and Trion Zone

Bi-Polar Suspension to 2012 when ﬁnal time line separation of Meajhe Zone /Bridge Zone and Trion Zone
/Phantom Matrix occurs. GA ''Last Call'' for Illuminati and Human Bridge Zone Emerald Covenant Amnesty/
